properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:54PM EST until January 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow will overspread the area this evening and continue
through the night. The snow will be heavy at times. Lulls in the
snow are expected on Saturday. Total snowfall by Saturday
evening will be in the 5 to 8 inch range. Lake effect snow will
develop Saturday evening and this will be combined with windy
conditions. Blowing and drifting snow along with slippery roads
are expected Saturday night. Additional snowfall Saturday night
of 1 to 2 inches possible.

* WHERE...Portions of central, south central, southwest and west
central Michigan.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Some power outages
will be possible due to the winds combining with the weight of
the wet snow on tree limbs and power lines. Blowing and drifting
snow is expected Saturday night which will limit visibility.
Area roads will quickly ice up Saturday evening.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A heavy wet snow is expected tonight with
intermittent snow on Saturday. Colder air pours in Saturday
night with lake effect snow increasing.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Allow for extra time
to reach your destination.

Prepare a emergency kit for home in case you lose power.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
